search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Userflow (userflow.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Userflow can be accessed at the following URL: [https://www.userflow.com/pricing](https://www.userflow.com/pricing)【3:1†source】.

extracted_content.content:
You'll be in great company
--------------------------

“We evaluated the top digital adoption platforms, and Userflow had the most bang for the buck. It was reasonably priced, had excellent UI, and incredibly helpful onboarding and support.”

![Image 1: image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666bc9172254723eadc4af82/666c2903dee7df7ba5eff57f_testimonial-1.jpg)

Jonathan Brink

UX Lead, Streamsets

“Userflow is the most intuitive and well-built onboarding solution in the market. I have evaluated them all and can confidently say that you need not look beyond Userflow.”

![Image 2: image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666bc9172254723eadc4af82/666c290378d4ab5be9dd2f2c_testimonial-2.jpg)

Arpit Choudhury

Founder, Data-led Academy

“Userflow makes it easy to iterate on onboarding experiments based on data. It's very intuitive to use and the customer service is phenomenal!”

![Image 3: image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666bc9172254723eadc4af82/666c29038f1a1e34efd15d94_testimonial-3.jpg)

Lise Lin

Product Specialist, Fleetcor

Trusted by 500+ software providers
----------------------------------

![Image 4: icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666bc9172254723eadc4af82/666bff2dc2de63f177dc0f84_client-logo.svg)

![Image 5: icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666bc9172254723eadc4af82/666bff2dc2de63f177dc0f84_client-logo.svg)

Common pricing questions
------------------------

What counts as an MAU (Monthly Active User)?

A user is considered active if they visit your app where Userflow is installed within the last 1 month. This count is a rolling window, not fixed to specific calendar months. For example, if today is the 15th of April, we're looking at user activity from the 16th of March to today. So, if you have 10,000 users in your database and 6,000 of them signed into your app in the past 1 month, then you have 6,000 MAUs.

In rare cases, where your users average more than 1,000 events each (less than 1% of our customers reach this), MAUs will be calculated as the total number of events divided by 1,000.

You can add additional bundles of 5,000 MAUs at $80/month on annual billing or $100/mo on monthly billing. Additional MAU bundles above 100,000 MAUs are discounted by 50%.

What counts as an AI message

AI Assistant delivers automated answers to your users' questions within your app, leveraging your knowledge base and website, and powered by OpenAI's GPT-4.

Each question/answer pair counts as a "message" in a given month. Each plan comes with a number of AI messages per month included.

You can add additional bundles of 500 AI messages/mo at $80/month on annual billing or $100/mo on monthly billing.

What counts as team member?

A team member is a person with access to your Userflow account. They can build flows, analyze users and manage settings. Example: If you have 3 team members, you can invite 2 other users to join you.

Additional team members cost $16/mo per seat on annual billing and $20/mo per seat on monthly billing. The Pro and Enterprise plans comes with unlimited team members.

How many views can my flows and checklists get?

Unlimited!

What happens if I exceed my plan's limits?

If you exceed the number of MAUs or AI messages that's included in your plans, you will be automatically upgraded with the additional bundles fitting to your level. The owner of the account will receive an email notification when this happens.

Can I pay yearly?

Yes! Just choose yearly billing when entering your card details after your 14-day trial expires. You'll save 20%.

What kind of support do you offer?

Your experience is the most important thing to us! We promise expert-level support via email, live-chat and occasional video/phone. We answer questions very fast (usually within hours or minutes during business hours), and never hesitate getting into the machinery to help you.

Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?

Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade at any time, as long as you don't exceed the new plan's limits.

Do I have to sign a long-term contract?

No. You just pay as you go — month-to-month (or year-to-year if you choose yearly billing). You can cancel anytime without penalty.

What if I want to cancel?

If you decide that Userflow is not for you, you can easily cancel your account under Settings -\> Billing.

Can i remove the "Made with Userflow" branding?

Yes, when you buy a subscription you can remove "Made with Userflow" under Settings → Company. On the Pro plan and up you can remove it from all content. On Startup you can remove it from all content except the resource center..

Is Userflow GDPR compliant?

Is Userflow SOC 2 certified?

Yes! We're SOC 2 Type 2 certified. Read more in our [Security Overview](https://www.userflow.com/policies/security).

Will my data be private and safe?

Yes! You and your users' data are yours and yours alone. They're safe with us. We do not, and will never, sell or share this data with anyone else. Our servers are hosted in Google Cloud Platform, and all communication with our service is encrypted. See also our [**Security Overview**](https://www.userflow.com/policies/security).

Have more questions?

Feature comparison
------------------

Non-exhaustive list. Looking for more? [Ask us](https://www.userflow.com/pricing#)

Privacy Preference Center

When you visit websites, they may store or retrieve data in your browser. This storage is often necessary for the basic functionality of the website. The storage may be used for marketing, analytics, and personalization of the site, such as storing your preferences. Privacy is important to us, so you have the option of disabling certain types of storage that may not be necessary for the basic functioning of the website. Blocking categories may impact your experience on the website.

Reject all cookies

Allow all cookies

Manage Consent Preferences by Category

Essential

**Always Active**

These items are required to enable basic website functionality.

Marketing

Essential

These items are used to deliver advertising that is more relevant to you and your interests. They may also be used to limit the number of times you see an advertisement and measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns. Advertising networks usually place them with the website operator’s permission.

Personalization

Essential

These items allow the website to remember choices you make (such as your user name, language, or the region you are in) and provide enhanced, more personal features. For example, a website may provide you with local weather reports or traffic news by storing data about your current location.

Analytics

Essential

These items help the website operator understand how its website performs, how visitors interact with the site, and whether there may be technical issues. This storage type usually doesn’t collect information that identifies a visitor.

Confirm my preferences and close

Costs less than dropping new users during onboarding. You'll save so many developer hours every month!

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing includes subscription tiers and usage-based pricing for additional MAUs, AI messages, and team members.

extracted_content.content:
You'll be in great company
--------------------------

“We evaluated the top digital adoption platforms, and Userflow had the most bang for the buck. It was reasonably priced, had excellent UI, and incredibly helpful onboarding and support.”

![Image 1: image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666bc9172254723eadc4af82/666c2903dee7df7ba5eff57f_testimonial-1.jpg)

Jonathan Brink

UX Lead, Streamsets

“Userflow is the most intuitive and well-built onboarding solution in the market. I have evaluated them all and can confidently say that you need not look beyond Userflow.”

![Image 2: image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666bc9172254723eadc4af82/666c290378d4ab5be9dd2f2c_testimonial-2.jpg)

Arpit Choudhury

Founder, Data-led Academy

“Userflow makes it easy to iterate on onboarding experiments based on data. It's very intuitive to use and the customer service is phenomenal!”

![Image 3: image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666bc9172254723eadc4af82/666c29038f1a1e34efd15d94_testimonial-3.jpg)

Lise Lin

Product Specialist, Fleetcor

Trusted by 500+ software providers
----------------------------------

![Image 4: icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666bc9172254723eadc4af82/666bff2dc2de63f177dc0f84_client-logo.svg)

![Image 5: icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666bc9172254723eadc4af82/666bff2dc2de63f177dc0f84_client-logo.svg)

Common pricing questions
------------------------

What counts as an MAU (Monthly Active User)?

A user is considered active if they visit your app where Userflow is installed within the last 1 month. This count is a rolling window, not fixed to specific calendar months. For example, if today is the 15th of April, we're looking at user activity from the 16th of March to today. So, if you have 10,000 users in your database and 6,000 of them signed into your app in the past 1 month, then you have 6,000 MAUs.

In rare cases, where your users average more than 1,000 events each (less than 1% of our customers reach this), MAUs will be calculated as the total number of events divided by 1,000.

You can add additional bundles of 5,000 MAUs at $80/month on annual billing or $100/mo on monthly billing. Additional MAU bundles above 100,000 MAUs are discounted by 50%.

What counts as an AI message

AI Assistant delivers automated answers to your users' questions within your app, leveraging your knowledge base and website, and powered by OpenAI's GPT-4.

Each question/answer pair counts as a "message" in a given month. Each plan comes with a number of AI messages per month included.

You can add additional bundles of 500 AI messages/mo at $80/month on annual billing or $100/mo on monthly billing.

What counts as team member?

A team member is a person with access to your Userflow account. They can build flows, analyze users and manage settings. Example: If you have 3 team members, you can invite 2 other users to join you.

Additional team members cost $16/mo per seat on annual billing and $20/mo per seat on monthly billing. The Pro and Enterprise plans comes with unlimited team members.

How many views can my flows and checklists get?

Unlimited!

What happens if I exceed my plan's limits?

If you exceed the number of MAUs or AI messages that's included in your plans, you will be automatically upgraded with the additional bundles fitting to your level. The owner of the account will receive an email notification when this happens.

Can I pay yearly?

Yes! Just choose yearly billing when entering your card details after your 14-day trial expires. You'll save 20%.

What kind of support do you offer?

Your experience is the most important thing to us! We promise expert-level support via email, live-chat and occasional video/phone. We answer questions very fast (usually within hours or minutes during business hours), and never hesitate getting into the machinery to help you.

Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?

Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade at any time, as long as you don't exceed the new plan's limits.

Do I have to sign a long-term contract?

No. You just pay as you go — month-to-month (or year-to-year if you choose yearly billing). You can cancel anytime without penalty.

What if I want to cancel?

If you decide that Userflow is not for you, you can easily cancel your account under Settings -\> Billing.

Can i remove the "Made with Userflow" branding?

Yes, when you buy a subscription you can remove "Made with Userflow" under Settings → Company. On the Pro plan and up you can remove it from all content. On Startup you can remove it from all content except the resource center..

Is Userflow GDPR compliant?

Is Userflow SOC 2 certified?

Yes! We're SOC 2 Type 2 certified. Read more in our [Security Overview](https://www.userflow.com/policies/security).

Will my data be private and safe?

Yes! You and your users' data are yours and yours alone. They're safe with us. We do not, and will never, sell or share this data with anyone else. Our servers are hosted in Google Cloud Platform, and all communication with our service is encrypted. See also our [**Security Overview**](https://www.userflow.com/policies/security).

Have more questions?

Feature comparison
------------------
